text: Victor Argo (November 5, 1934 âˆ’ April 7, 2004) was an American actor of Puerto Rican descent. He played tough bad guys in his movies. His career went on for over 40 years. Argo began his career as a stage actor. He performed in an off- Broadway stage play in the 1960s. He then met Yoko Ono. With her, he did a so- called "Happening" movement. Argo's movies include Taxi Driver, The Last Temptation of Christ, Bad Lieutenant and True Romance. He also played in television shows, including Wonder Woman, Law & Order and Miami Vice. Argo was born in The Bronx, New York City.
